channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s the tech powering ICE’s deportation crackdown
item.description: From phone spyware and facial recognition to phone unlocking technology and databases and more, this tech powers Trump's deportation machine.

item.title: After 5 Years, Apple Finally Upgrades the AirTag
item.description: The second-generation AirTag features Apple’s newer Ultra Wideband chip and has a louder speaker and better range.

item.title: This Wireless Mic Kit Is $70 Off
item.description: Save on a full DJI Mic 3 bundle, or pick and choose to build your own portable recording setup.

item.title: The 10 Best Sleep Masks We’ve Tested While Snoozing (2026)
